author: hwright
msg: Add a few more implementation plan notes.

author: gstein
msg: Finish the per-directory location and construction within wc_db.
Notably, the return values of parse_local_relpath() were wrong. The caller
cannot simply use pdh->local_relpath since that refers to the relpath of
the *directory* rather than corresponding to local_abspath (which could
(parse_local_relpath): take an extra parameter to return the
local_relpath associated with the passed local_abspath. internally,
construct two local_relpaths: one for the directory (pdh_relpath), and
one for being returned (build_relpath). in the scan-up loop, if we run
into a preexisting PDH, then we can terminate the loop and use the
information stored there. once we find the database in some directory,
then we also create PDH records for all the directories that we
(test_pdh): new test to exercise some of the PDH construction
